docs.snippet: In this lesson, students explore the July 1999 space shuttle mission while learning how to cite Web sites in correct MLA bibliographical format. Students will first discuss an article about this mission’s goals and historic importance as the...
docs.abstract: In this lesson, students explore the July 1999 space shuttle mission while learning how to cite Web sites in correct MLA bibliographical format. Students will first discuss an article about this mission’s goals and historic importance as the first American space flight commanded by a woman. Students then participate in a Web ‘scavenger hunt’ to find related Web sites, and correctly cite these Web sites using the MLA format taught in class.

headline.main: Woman on a Mission

docs.snippet: After more than 15 years of dreaming, Barbara Morgan finally got her long-awaited assignment today. An elementary school-teacher-turned-astronaut, Mrs. Morgan will be in a crew going to the International Space Station next year.    Mrs. Morgan, 51...
docs.abstract: Barbara Morgan, elementary school teacher who became astronaut, will be in crew going to International Space Station next year; Morgan, 51, was backup for Christa McAuliffe, who was to have been first teacher in space when she died in explosion of space shuttle Challenger in 1986 (S)
